Uses of Class
net.sourceforge.argparse4j.ArgumentParserBuilder

  • Packages that use ArgumentParserBuilder 
    Package Description
    net.sourceforge.argparse4j  

    • Uses of ArgumentParserBuilder in net.sourceforge.argparse4j

      Methods in net.sourceforge.argparse4j that return ArgumentParserBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.addHelp(boolean flag)
      If true, -h/--help are available.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.cjkWidthHack(boolean flag)
      Set true to enable CJK width hack.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.defaultFormatWidth(int defaultFormatWidth)
      Set the default format width.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.fromFilePrefix(String fromFilePrefix)
      The set of characters that prefix file path from which additional arguments should be read.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.locale(Locale locale)
      The locale to use for messages.
      static ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParsers.newFor(String prog)
      Creates ArgumentParserBuilder with given program name.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.noDestConversionForPositionalArgs(boolean flag)
      Do not perform any conversion to produce "dest" value (See Argument.getDest()) from positional argument name.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.prefixChars(String prefixChars)
      The set of characters that prefix named arguments.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.singleMetavar(boolean flag)
      If singleMetavar is true, a metavar string in help message is only shown after the last flag instead of each flag.
      ArgumentParserBuilder ArgumentParserBuilder.terminalWidthDetection(boolean flag)
      Set true to enable terminal width detection.
